name: When Last Login – Welcome Email
author: YooHoo Plugins

sections.description:
An add-on to When Last Login which allows you to send your users a welcome email when logging into your site for the first time. Change all welcome email content in minutes!

Features

  • Add a logo to your welcome email
  • Enter in a subject of your preference
  • Enter in your own email content
  • Shortcodes/tags available to use in your email body
  • Enter in footer credits such as a link back to your website

Related Add-ons for When Last Login

  • When Last Login – Export User Records
  • When Last Login – Slack Notifications
  • When Last Login – User Statistics
  • When Last Login – Zapier Integration
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the ‘/wp-content/plugins’ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Navigate to the ‘When Last Login’ menu item and click on the ‘Welcome Emails’ settings tab.
  4. Configure your settings to your preference.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin files to the ‘/wp-content/plugins’ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Navigate to the ‘When Last Login’ menu item and click on the ‘Welcome Emails’ settings tab.
  4. Configure your settings to your preference.

Do I require any other plugins for this add-on to work?

Yes, you will need When Last Login installed and activated on your website in order for this plugin to work.

What does When Last Login – User Email do exactly?

When Last Login – Welcome Email sends your users a ‘welcome’ email when logging into your site for the first time.

Is this plugin free?

Yes, When Last Login – Welcome Email is a free plugin for WordPress.

Can I change the content of my welcome email?

Yes, you’ll be able to personalize your welcome email with a logo of your choice, as well as choose from a variety of shortcodes to add to body of the email
